channel.title: [Delta]Gambling command

item.title: [Delta]Gambling command
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

[quote=“Roar337, post:6, topic:419829”]yea a few of your symbols are wrong such as
if(gamble > 49 || gamble < 100) {
assuming you want it to give money for above 49 and below 100 it should be

if(gamble > 49 && gamble < 100) {

try using this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gamble") && HasItemAmount(995, 500000)) { int gamble = misc.random(101); deleteItem(995, 500000); if(gamble > 49 && gamble < 100) { addItem(995, 1000000); sM(""+gamble+", You have won!"); } else if(gamble == 100) { sM(""+gamble+", You have won Triple!"); addItem(995, 1500000); } else if(gamble < 49 { sM(""+gamble+", Sorry"); } else if (!HasItemAmount(995, 500000)) { sM("You need 500,000 coins to gamble medium"); } }

i have to go home now hope it works - it should[/quote]
Well if i still type any command(excluding this one) it still says “You need 500,000…”

Read full topic

item.title: [Delta]Gambling command
item.dc:creator: @Roar337 Roar337
item.description:
@Roar337 wrote:

yea a few of your symbols are wrong such as
if(gamble > 49 || gamble < 100) {
assuming you want it to give money for above 49 and below 100 it should be

if(gamble > 49 && gamble < 100) {

try using this

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gamble") && HasItemAmount(995, 500000)) { int gamble = misc.random(101); deleteItem(995, 500000); if(gamble > 49 && gamble < 100) { addItem(995, 1000000); sM(""+gamble+", You have won!"); } else if(gamble == 100) { sM(""+gamble+", You have won Triple!"); addItem(995, 1500000); } else if(gamble < 49 { sM(""+gamble+", Sorry"); } else if (!HasItemAmount(995, 500000)) { sM("You need 500,000 coins to gamble medium"); } }

i have to go home now hope it works - it should

where are you trying to put this? also there are some errors in the code i beleive also if i gave you a void would you know how to make it run the void when you click the item?

Well it’s a command, so it goes where all the other commands go aswell.

Umm i’m just trying to make a command.
[/quote]

o yea duhh put your int under btw i already have errors fixed want em?

So… is their something i’m missing?

item.title: [Delta]Gambling command
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

int gamble = misc.random(100); if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("gamble") && HasItemAmount(995, 500000)) { deleteItem(995, 500000); if(gamble > 49 || gamble < 100) { addItem(995, 1000000); sM(""+gamble+", You have won!"); } else if(gamble == 100) { sM(""+gamble+", You have won Triple!"); addItem(995, 1500000); } else { sM(""+gamble+", Sorry"); } } else { sM("You need 500,000 coins to gamble medium"); }(sorry if it’s messy)
[font=comic sans ms]I made this rmandle command on my server, but whenever i enter a command besides this:[/font]

(sorry if it’s messy)
Can someone please help me try to figure this out?

Read full topic
